intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: The blizzard has gotten worse. I can barely see anything in front of me... Kris, I think I can see somebody ahead. Is that...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Ah! Sire, please stay behind me. I feel the presence of enemies. Several are currently targeting us.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: What!? But, we can't see anything like this. How should we fight back?

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: We've no choice but to directly engage the enemy. It will probably be a dangerous battle, unlike any we've faced previously.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Indeed. We should select those who'll fight with prudence.

battle.speaker: Athena
battle.line: Huff... huff... They are coming after you, Prince Marth. Ve vanted to varn you...

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: Ah! I see. So you wanted to help me... Thank you, Athena. It's fine now; I'll handle the rest. We'll defeat the enemy!

battle.speaker: Clarisse
battle.line: That wench... How dare she get in our way. If she hadn't spotted us, I could have shot the prince dead. Tsk! Oh well. As long as this blizzard carries on... This battle is mine. You can't see anything, can you? But we can. Now it's time for you to die, blind and blissfully ignorant.

boss.speaker: Clarisse
boss.line: You want to escape from this darkness? I'm afraid I won't let you. You won't see the sunlight ever again.

boss.speaker: Clarisse
boss.line: How... how dare you... I'll... I'll kill... anybody in my way... Just watch me... I'll kill... I'll kill you all!

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sire, we have routed the enemy.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: We have accomplished our objective. There is no need to remain here. Let us continue to the Ice Dragon Shrine.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Indeed. The sooner we meet Lord Gotoh, the better. Let's go.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Unh... Ugh... Lady... Eremiya... I'm... alone... once again...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Clarisse...

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: R-Reese...! Why... are you here...? Don't tell me... You came here to laugh at pathetic old me?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Come on, hold on to me. Let's return to the hideout, together.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Wha...?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: You can't walk around wounded like this. And you'll freeze to death if you don't find shelter soon.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Why...? Why would you... go so far to help me...! I've always treated... you like dirt and yet you...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Because you're my little sister.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: ...Pfft. You know I'm not your sister. We're both orphans, remember...? We've always been alone...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: But, we were raised together by Lady Eremiya... I don't mind if you hate me. But, I don't want to lose you... If I were to lose this one bond... I'd be alone in the dark, again... And the same goes for you.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: ...Reese...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Please, hold onto me.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: B-bah... This will be the first and last time I'm gonna obey you, you hear me...?

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: ...Yes, I am aware of Altea's actions. We will begin the next phase of our plan. Your wish is our command, Master Gharnef...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Lady Eremiya...!

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: Clarisse failed, didn't she?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Y-yes... She's severely wounded... We need to have her treated!

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: Dispose of her.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: B-but, Lady Eremiya!

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: She's of no use to me wounded like this. Just leave her and she'll die by herself.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: What's with that face...? It's natural... that I'd die if I failed... I knew... this would happen... but, but...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Clarisse...

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Go away. I don't want... you to see me like this.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: ...Very well.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: ...... Reese... Wait... Don't go... I changed my mind... stay with me. I don't want... to be alone...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Clarisse... I'm right here. I'll always be by your side. After all, I'm your big sister.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Bah! You have to be annoying, till the end... ...Sis... ter... ... ... ...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: ...Clarisse...
